project_description: A simple Flutter application that uses the Cubit pattern for state management to switch between displaying a cat and a dog with corresponding icons.
architecture_overview: The project uses the Cubit pattern for state management, organized into separate folders for screens, cubits, models, and widgets. The app consists of a single screen with a text and an icon that changes when clicked.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the Flutter application. Provides the AnimalCubit using BlocProvider.

files.name: lib/screens/animal_screen.dart
files.description: Defines the main screen of the application that displays and switches between the animal text and icon.

files.name: lib/cubits/animal_cubit.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalCubit which manages the state of the currently displayed animal.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the displayed animal between cat and dog.

files.name: lib/cubits/animal_state.dart
files.description: Defines the states managed by the AnimalCubit.

files.name: lib/widgets/animal_text.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalText widget that displays the text and icon of the current animal.

files.name: lib/models/animal.dart
files.description: Defines the Animal model representing the animal data.

widgets.name: AnimalScreen
widgets.description: Main screen displaying the animal text and icon.

widgets.name: AnimalText
widgets.description: Widget displaying the text and icon of the current animal.

cubits.name: AnimalCubit
cubits.description: Manages the state of the currently displayed animal.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the displayed animal between cat and dog.

models.name: Animal
models.description: Represents an animal with a name and an icon.

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using Bloc and Cubit

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> AnimalScreen: click text
AnimalScreen -> AnimalCubit: toggleAnimal()
AnimalCubit -> AnimalState: change state
AnimalScreen -> AnimalText: rebuild with new state
@enduml
state_management_flow: The AnimalCubit manages the state of the currently displayed animal. When the user clicks the text, the toggleAnimal method is called, which toggles the state between AnimalCat and AnimalDog. The AnimalScreen listens to state changes and rebuilds the AnimalText widget with the new state.
navigation_flow: The app has a single screen, AnimalScreen, which displays the AnimalText widget. There is no additional navigation.
